pullRequest.title: Migrate commands to v1
pullRequest.bodyText:
This migrates commands to v1 and makes some changes to the registration process of commands.
Commands are registered in an event now. These changes now allow for listeners of the event to have a definite context about whether a server is an integrated server (when checking !dedicated).

nodes.bodyText: Very minor, but I feel like these parameters should be in the opposite order since dispatcher will always be used while dedicated is secondary.
Please add a brief example, it may use [...] but should suffice to get an idea how to use this as an experienced Java dev without the wiki or digging deeply into the code.

commit.message:
Update fabric-command-v1/src/main/java/net/fabricmc/fabric/api/command/v1/CommandRegistrationCallback.java

Whoops forgot that one

Co-Authored-By: Juuxel <6596629+Juuxel@users.noreply.github.com>
module name order has been restored.
